attributes.action: ensure that Sir Fred Goodwin is (a) sued for having brought the Royal Bank of Scotland to its knees and having presided over its losses of £24billion; and (b) is stripped of his knighthood.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ensure that Sir Fred Goodwin is (a) sued for having brought the Royal Bank of Scotland to its knees and having presided over its losses of £24billion; and (b) is stripped of his knighthood.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
